mapper.select: SELECT cu.cuChatSeq as chatSeq FROM chatUser cu JOIN chat ct ON ct.chatSeq = cu.cuChatSeq AND ct.chatDelNy = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND cu.cuMember = #{seq}

SELECT cu.cuChatSeq as chatSeq ,cu.cuMember ,mm.mmSeq ,mm.mmNickName ,up.upPath ,up.upUuidName FROM chatUser cu JOIN member mm ON cu.cuMember = mm.mmSeq LEFT JOIN uploadedMember up ON mm.mmSeq = up.upMemberSeq AND up.upDelNy = 0 AND up.upDefaultNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND cu.cuMember != #{cuMember} AND cu.cuChatSeq = #{chatSeq}
